alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otsego County through 400 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edmeston, or 12 miles west of Cooperstown, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cooperstown, Edmeston, Burlington, Exeter Center, South Brookfield and Oaksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
